headline: FPL rate settlement reduces request by nearly a third, limits average annual bill increases to 2%, maintains consumer protections
summary: Florida Power & Light Company and 10 key stakeholder groups filed a comprehensive four-year rate settlement agreement with state regulators today that significantly reduces FPL's original revenue request while keeping residential customer bills well below the projected national average through the end of the decade.

raw.headline: FPL rate settlement reduces request by nearly a third, limits average annual bill increases to 2%, maintains consumer protections
raw.summary: Florida Power & Light Company and 10 key stakeholder groups filed a comprehensive four-year rate settlement agreement with state regulators today that significantly reduces FPL's original revenue request while keeping residential customer bills well below the projected national average through the end of the decade.

headline: NextEra Energy: Drill, Baby, Drill Won't Stop This Investment-Grade Dividend Yield From Growth
summary: NextEra Energy boosts its renewables backlog to 30GW, with strong EPS growth forecasts.

headline: AI Is Ushering in a ‘Power Revolution.’ Buy These 5 Energy Stocks, Melius Says.
summary: Independent power producers like Constellation Energy and Vistra are well-positioned to benefit from the AI boom, the analysts said.

headline: Trump Trade: SoftBank makes Intel investment as Nvidia preps new chip
summary: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: INTEL STAKE: The Trump administration is in discussions to take a 10% in Intel by converting some or all of the company’s grants from the Chips and Science Act into equity, Mackenzie Hawkins, Ryan Gould and Josh Wingrove of Bloomberg reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.
